ReactionFormula: CoA + 2 Ferredoxin(ox) + Pyruvate -> H+ + Acetyl-CoA + 2 Ferredoxin(red) + CO2
2 Ferredoxin(red) + 1 NAD + 1.25 H+ + 0.25 ADP + 0.25 Phosphate -> 2 Ferredoxin(ox) + 1 NADH + 0.25 ATP + 0.25 H2O
2 Ferredoxin(red) + 1 NAD + 1.5 H+ + 1 Phosphate -> 2 Ferredoxin(ox) + 1 NADH + 0.5 PPi + 0.5 H2O
2 ferredoxin(red) + NADH + 2 NADP+ = 2 ferredoxin(ox) + NAD+ + 2 NADPH
2 ferredoxin(red) + NADH + 2 H+ = NAD+ + 2 H2 + 2 Ferredoxin(ox)
